post.body: I started following my self? Ha!

Guys, I can't create a new site. Python spits some error message:

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "zeronet.py", line 16, in main
    main.start()
  File "src\main.py", line 419, in start
    actions.call(config.action, action_kwargs)
  File "src\main.py", line 118, in call
    func(**kwargs)
  File "src\main.py", line 166, in siteCreate
    site.saveSettings()
  File "src\Site\Site.py", line 104, in saveSettings
    SiteManager.site_manager.save()
  File "plugins\MergerSite\MergerSitePlugin.py", line 305, in save
    super(SiteManagerPlugin, self).save(*args, **kwags)
  File "src\Site\SiteManager.py", line 64, in save
    site.settings["size"] = site.content_manager.getTotalSize()  # Update site size
  File "src\Content\ContentManager.py", line 244, in getTotalSize
    size = self.contents.db.getTotalSize(self.site.address, ignore)
  File "src\Content\ContentDb.py", line 95, in getTotalSize
    params = {"site_id": self.site_ids[site_address]}

comment.body: @علي محمد: Thanks! Why didn't I think of that? Successfully created http://127.0.0.1:43110/1gSDC4UJnLdtFsHdyYkk9nyYVDcSm6dKW/
